articles.title: Unity says its AI tech will soon eliminate the need for coding - Game Developer
articles.description: Company CEO Matt Bromberg claims AI will empower non-coders and seasoned developers alike.
articles.content: Engine maker Unity hasn't been shy about throwing its weight behind generative AI tools in a purported bid to help its users boost discoverability, generate advertising revenue, and accelerate produc… [+2353 chars]
